function RYU_EP05_09()
    -- .承-2【2月第1週】「親友」
    SaveData.Title = "親友"

    -- //BG：男子部教室（夕方）
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG015ba")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM01.wav",0)

    -- //BU：オウガ（通常）、先輩たち（焦り、ダリア（通常）
LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
LAYER_POSITION(50,-600,0)
LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MAA01ga")
LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_DAR01aa")
LAYER_POSITION(60,-200,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0115.wav")
    MSG([[
    【#1】Flustered
 "Eh, Erika-dono is……" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai2_0087.wav")
    MSG([[
    【#2】Flustered
 "Minato-dono dressed as a girl……!?" ]])

    MSG([[ After the girls' division after school, we revealed the truth to the boys' division as well. Their reactions varied; while the upperclassmen were surprised, surprisingly Ouga seemed calm. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2051.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Surprised
 "A-Aren't you surprised, Ouga-kun?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0410.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】Normal
 "Huh? Ah, I am surprised. That Minato and he are the same person." ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01ea")
LAYER_POSITION(50,-600,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0411.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】Smiling
 "To think the person I seriously fell for was my best friend... it was quite a rare experience. I thank you, Minato. Or rather, I should call you Erika Joshi in that form." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2052.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Flustered
 "I-I was deceiving everyone all along!? And yet, you're not angry?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
LAYER_POSITION(50,-600,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0412.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】Normal
 "I am well aware that Minato wouldn't senselessly toy with people's hearts. If I feel anger, it would be directed at myself." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0413.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】Normal
 "Surely, in that form, you must have agonized in secret. Receiving affection from me as a man must have also caused confusion." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0414.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】Normal
 "I apologize as your best friend for not noticing your struggles and pain until today. I'm sorry, Minato." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2053.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Surprised
 "O-Ouga-kun!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_DAR01ea")
LAYER_POSITION(60,-200,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0591.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】Smiling
 "That's why I said it. Ouga-kun surely wouldn't be angry." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ja")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2054.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Tearful smile
 "" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Just as Daria-san said, I was foolish. I worried alone, always thinking of the worst, feeling cornered. ]])

    MSG([[ If only I had honestly talked to those around me, things would have improved so much. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ja")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_plus0006.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Tearful smile
 (I see... it's okay to be supported when things are tough.) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ More powerful than any weapon or martial art. That might be the connection between people. ]])

    MSG([[ Until now, I only chased after Marika-nee's back and hadn’t noticed such an obvious thing. ]])

    MSG([[ Once again, I realize how narrow my perspective was. I'm truly glad I came to Yuriai Private Academy and met everyone. ]])

    MSG([[ … ]])

LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_DAR01aa")
LAYER_POSITION(60,-200,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0592.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】Normal
 "…that's why. Could we borrow some power from your families?" ]])

    MSG([[ After that, Daria-san explained all the circumstances to the girls’ division just as she had. ]])

    MSG([[ Thanks to her concise and easy-to-understand explanation, which I could never imitate, the boys’ division seemed convinced. ]])

    MSG([[ But for some reason, the upperclassmen's mood was not good. ]])

LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MAA01aa")
LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0120.wav")
    MSG([[
    【#3】Normal
 "Sorry... but the Hououin family doesn't get along with the Otohime Group... there’s no connection at all." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0415.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】Normal
 "Leave this to me. As Erika Joshi knows, the Ryuguuin family and the Rokujou family are on friendly terms." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0416.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】Normal
 "I'll do my best to arrange an appointment with the Ryuguuin family." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2055.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Smiling
 "Th-thank you, Ouga-kun!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01ea")
LAYER_POSITION(50,-600,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0417.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】Smiling
 "Hmph. Even knowing it's Minato, being spoken to so familiarly by that face is uplifting." ]])

LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MAA01ma")
LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0116.wav")
    MSG([[
    【#1】Excited
 "M-Minato-dono... if you don't mind, could you scold me with Erika-dono’s voice?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2056.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Sad
 "I respectfully decline." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MAA01ga")
LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0117.wav")
    MSG([[
    【#1】Flustered
 "Whoa! So cold! But that’s exactly what I love!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_DAR01fa")
LAYER_POSITION(60,-200,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0593.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】Wry smile, sweat
 "I understand your feelings, but calm yourself. What we should prioritize now is deciding what to do after arranging the appointment with the Ryuguuin family." ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
LAYER_POSITION(50,-600,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0418.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】Normal
 "If I’m the one to grab the attention of Ryuguuin, it’s meaningless unless we know where Uran is inside the mansion." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0419.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】Normal
 "If we start searching after entering the mansion, the guards will spot us soon enough." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2057.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Normal
 "My cousin is currently investigating the Ryuguuin family. Maybe through that, we might find out." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_DAR01ea")
LAYER_POSITION(60,-200,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0594_1.0.1.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】Smiling
 "Ryuujouin has visited Uran-kun’s house many times since childhood. She will surely be of help too." ]])

    MSG([[ According to Ryuujouin-san, the Ryuguuin family mansion is vast and divided into several buildings. ]])

    MSG([[ Before infiltration, we must grasp which building Uran-san is in and its location; otherwise, meeting her would be impossible. ]])

    MSG([[ Akira sarcastically said, "It’s like a dungeon," but it’s true that strategy info is essential. ]])

LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_DAR01aa")
LAYER_POSITION(60,-200,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0595.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】Normal
 "By the way, while Ouga-kun arranges the appointment, how do you plan on infiltrating, Minato-kun?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2058.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Surprised
 "Ah... y-yeah. If a random person like me is beside Ouga-kun, we’d be suspicious." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0596.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】Normal
 "Also, I think the Himegami family has notified people of Minato-kun’s face, right? Going in as you are wouldn’t be wise." ]])

    MSG([[ It was a complete blind spot. If I enter the mansion riding along on Ouga-kun's appointment with Ryuguuin, how would I accompany him right beside him? ]])

LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MAA01ga")
LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0118.wav")
    MSG([[
    【#1】Flustered
 "What if you climbed over the fence while Ouga-dono draws attention!?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0420.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】Normal
 "Ryuguuin mansion has many guard dogs roaming freely. In less than five minutes, you'd be dog food." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai2_0088_1.0.1.wav")
    MSG([[
    【#2】Flustered
 "How about slapping Ryuguuin with a karate chop on the neck to make him sleep!?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0421.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】Normal
 "That would be a crime. Also, Ryuguuin is a master of karate and aikido. To put him to sleep, you'd need a tranquilizer gun meant for bears." ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01pa")
LAYER_POSITION(50,-600,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0422.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】Laughing loudly
 "Relax! From the moment I heard this story, I had an overwhelmingly brilliant plan in my head!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2059.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Surprised
 "A-an overwhelmingly brilliant plan!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0423.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】Laughing loudly
 "Come in! Yurikawa!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    -- //BU：モブ生徒メイド
LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB10ab")
LAYER_ALPHA(55,0)
LAYER_POSITION(55,700,0)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,300,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,255,500,Ease.OutCubic)
WAIT(500)

PLAY_VOICE("sakuya_0037.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Sakuya Yurikawa】
 "Please don't order me around—it's super annoying." ]])

    MSG([[ Yurikawa-san, my classmate, entered the classroom. ]])

    MSG([[ But unlike usual in her uniform, she was wearing a maid outfit I’d seen somewhere before. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2060.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Surprised
 "Ah, that...? That maid outfit is..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01ea")
LAYER_POSITION(50,-600,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0424.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】Smiling
 "Just so you know, it's not cosplay. This is Yurikawa. She's one of the maids who’s been taking care of the Rokujou family for a long time." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("sakuya_0038.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Sakuya Yurikawa】
 "I'm the one being taken care of. I had to study just to enter school with them, and dig into academy affairs. Seriously, I want a break." ]])

    MSG([[ Yurikawa-san brushed off Ouga-kun’s hand resting on her shoulder and continued speaking with great annoyance. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("sakuya_0039.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Sakuya Yurikawa】
 "So, what do you want? Even though I said no, you summon me in a maid outfit in front of acquaintances? This must be a very important matter, right?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
LAYER_POSITION(50,-600,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0425.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】Normal
 "Yeah, I'm giving you the most important mission." ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01ea")
LAYER_POSITION(50,-600,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0426.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】Smiling
 "For three days. During that time, make Minato the best maid possible." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("sakuya_0040.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Sakuya Yurikawa】
 "Okay, got it." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2061.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Smiling
 "Heh, turning me into a maid..." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2062.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Flustered
 "Nn!!?!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

    -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("RYU_EP05_10")
end
